items.content_html: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
